summary_text: This week: ~670 conversations. Routine reminders, family calls, and a few Medicare-related questions.
~672 conversations. One potential scam pattern (gift card request) flagged; caregiver notified.
~670 conversations. Mix of routine check-ins and doctor/pharmacy reminders. Two risk signals (IRS-themed call, account verification).
First week of year: ~672 conversations. Social Security and Medicare mentions; one urgency-language signal open.
Past year total: 35,000+ conversations across all devices. Routine daily use with periodic risk review.
